subject: Gymnastics
lead_paragraph: Competing in her first major international meet, Jordyn Wieber, the reigning United States junior champion, won the American Cup in Hoffman Estates, Ill. Wieber, 13, finished with 60.2 points to finish six-tenths ahead of Bridget Sloan, who helped the United States women win a silver medal at the Beijing Olympics. Wieber will not be eligible for the world championships until 2011.
